name: Running VoltGun
description:
Game made in under 72 hours for Ludum Dare 39. (Theme Running Out Of Power) 

Blast through three stages defeating enemies and bosses as you go. Be careful though as your battery meter continually keeps losing power. You can toggle through two power modes, (low and high) to help crush the enemy. Collect pick ups, avoid traps and blast your way through victory!

Default Controls (You can edit these in game)

Move: Arrows
A (Button 1): Fire
S (Button 2): Shoot
D (Button 3): Dash
F (Button 4): Power Toggle
Enter: Pause/Unpause Game

Made with love, made in under 72 hours. Sorry it's a bit rough around the edges, I sadly just simply ran out of time. It didn't help that I am also been very unwell lately. Hope ye enjoy!
